mapper.select: SELECT p.project_member_no projectMemberNo , p.project_no projectNo , t.task_no taskNo , w.work_member_name workMemberName FROM project_member p LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT task_no, project_member_no FROM task_member WHERE task_no = #{taskNo} ) t ON p.project_member_no = t.project_member_no INNER JOIN workspace_member w ON p.work_member_no = w.work_member_no WHERE p.project_no = #{projectNo} AND p.active = 'Y'
